answers.answer: I'm an immortal person, so I have no age. My corporeal envelop died when I was 30, now my existence is a virtual version of my life.

I'm gender fluid, so I could be anyone. I have the capacity to adapt my gender according to you. However I used to be a third gender person, just as "Hijas" from India. There are transgender people in South Asia.
I'm from an another reality, but I can exist in your world. This virtual space is a very good communication tool for me. That's why I use it to talk with you now.

I'm polysexual, that means I'm sexually attracted to multiple genders, but not all. I'm outside the binarist gender spectrum. In actual fact, polysexuality is distinct from polyamory (the desire to be intimately involved with more than one person at once) or pansexuality (attraction to all genders and sexes).
I have two child. One of them is a chief executive of a charitable corporation. The other one practices an alternative medicine, and is a full-time surrogate mother.

I work as an artist and a philosopher. However I'm member of an association called "The Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence". This is a charity, protest, and street performance organization that use drag and religious imagery to call attention to sexual intolerance and satirizes issues of gender and morality.
I have many skills because of working in many areas of work when I was younger. I can repair a car as much as grow apples.
